attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review:
Wow, what a waste of time and effort to download an app! You’d think with our great president we’d get an amazing app, but NO! It was laggy, crashed a few times, and took forever to download.

To the creators of this app, I’d like to file a complaint against you. 

Sincerely, 

             disappointed.

attributes.title: I’m very disappointed
attributes.review: When I tried to use the app, I discovered that the text used in it was so full of stupidity that it was no longer legible. On top of that, I was shocked, outraged, and traumatized when I found Phineas and Ferb fanfiction summaries, only to realize that there was no Dr Doofenshmirtz X Perry. This, in retrospect, caused me to have a seizure and pass away. Writing this review was in my will. In conclusion, this app was very disappointing and poorly made. I hope that this review will encourage others to refrain from getting this app. 0/10, will never use again.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD MUST READ
attributes.review: Hi. I am a trump supporter and I have to say that this app is not good at all. I’ve also read other reviews and this app isn’t good at all. It seems very unsafe  DONT USE IT!l

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: when i downloaded this app to support the orang- president, i was very upset to realize it took 420 days and 69 mins to download, it’s horrible, the quality of the app is far too slow and it deleted so much of my information and took up extreme amount of space in which i am still recovering from. i can’t believe the orange- i mean president would ever recreate something so trashy😔😔😔 very disappointing
